results.title: CARDIAC ASSESSMENTS AND IMPLANTABLE LOOP RECORDER PLACEMENT IN THREE MALE GELADAS (THEROPITHECUS GELADA).
results.text_hl: Due to the abnormalities on ECG and echo, he was treated with @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@. Treatment was continued for nearly two years, until the animal had @<m>DISEASE_Death_Sudden_Cardiac</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016757 @@@sudden cardiac death@@@ secondary to sustained @DISEASE_Ventricular_Fibrillation @DISEASE_MESH:D014693 @@@ventricular fibrillation@@@, which was confirmed by postmortem download of the loop recorder data and correlated with histologic evidence of @DISEASE_Cardiomyopathies @DISEASE_MESH:D009202 @@@cardiomyopathy@@@.

citations.NLM: Zec SH, Miller M, Hollinger C, Croft L, Goldman M, D'Andrea K, Moody JE, McCann C, Bartlett SL. CARDIAC ASSESSMENTS AND IMPLANTABLE LOOP RECORDER PLACEMENT IN THREE MALE GELADAS (THEROPITHECUS GELADA). J Zoo Wildl Med. 2025 Mar;56(1):175-183. PMID: 40067238
